block.comment: Create Acct_table able from EBS Account search result

input.sql:
select distinct
opp.opportunitynumber,
opp.accountid,
acct.id,
acct.Source_Record_Id__c,
CASE 
  WHEN acct.ID IS NOT NULL THEN acct.ID
  ELSE 
    CASE 
      WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'NA' THEN '0016e00003Lc7wmAAB'
      WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'EMEA' THEN '0016e00003X3hBlAAJ'
      WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'LATAM' THEN '0016e00003Lc7xuAAB'
      WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'APAC' THEN '0016e00003RWCSbAAP'
      ELSE '0016e00003Lc7wmAAB'
    END
END AS acct_Source_Record_Id__c,
CASE 
  WHEN opp.RTM = 'OEM' THEN '01s6e000006TmlZAAS'

  WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'EMEA' AND opp.RTM = 'Direct End Customer' THEN '01s6e000006Pm03AAC'
  WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'EMEA' AND opp.RTM IN ('Direct Reseller', 'Distributor') THEN '01s6e000006Pm0DAAS'

  WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'LATAM' AND opp.RTM = 'Direct End Customer' THEN '01s6e000006TmljAAC'
  WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'LATAM' AND opp.RTM IN ('Direct Reseller', 'Distributor') THEN '01s6e000006TmleAAC'

  WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'NA' AND opp.RTM = 'Direct End Customer' THEN '01s6e000006TmlUAAS'
  WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'NA' AND opp.RTM IN ('Direct Reseller', 'Distributor') THEN '01s6e000006TmloAAC'

  WHEN opp.SuperRegion = 'APAC' THEN pb.id  

  ELSE NULL
END AS PriceBookID,

CASE 
  WHEN acct.ID IS NOT NULL THEN acct.OwnerId
  ELSE '0056e00000EZ8rFAAT'
  END AS owner_id,


opp.name,
opp.amount,
opp.stagename,
opp.Bill_to_account,
opp.Countrycode,
opp.Dealregistration,
opp.Paynow,
opp.Recordtypeid,
opp.Contactfirstname,
opp.Contactlastname,
opp.Contactemail,
opp.Shiptoaccount,
opp.Closedate,
opp.Description,
opp.Forecastcateogry,
opp.Currencyisocode,
opp.Probablity,
opp.Opportunitysource,
opp.Rtm,
opp.Superregion,
opp.id,
opp.OracleOrderNumber,
opp.PONumber,
opp.CountryOfOrder






from #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"379daa8d","path":["list_name"]}')} as opp
left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"2986125a","path":["list_name"]}')} as acct on opp.accountid = acct.source_record_id__c
left join #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_smart_list","line":"9e21173b","path":["list_name"]}')} as pb on opp.Pb = pb.name
